AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Subtitle: From full-stack dev to parachutist artilleryman
AboutMe.Citation: My journey is as diverse as my passions

Stack.Title: Technologies used
Stack.Description: <paragraph>Passionate about web and mobile development, I am interested in everything related to the tech ecosystem, whether it's front-end, back-end, mobile, or infrastructure. I love to explore, test, compare, and continuously learn.</paragraph><paragraph>I work with modern technologies like React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, Angular, and Flutter, but I am also comfortable with more traditional stacks such as PHP/MySQL, .NET/C#, or PostgreSQL. On the mobile and native side, I use Kotlin, and for tooling, I leverage Copilot, Firebase, and anything that helps me move faster without compromising quality.</paragraph><paragraph>I donâ€™t limit myself to one framework or stack: I like to understand how things work under the hood, and I strive to be versatile, autonomous, and able to adapt to any environment.</paragraph>

Passions.Title: My passions
Passions.Description: I am a technology enthusiast with a great affection for computer hardware. When I'm not coding, you can find me painting miniature figurines, capturing moments with analog photography, or working at music festivals. I am a metal music fan, an avid gamer, and someone who loves exploring new interests. My curiosity knows no bounds, and I love learning and discovering new things

Premium.Title: Premium Pack
Premium.Subtitle: E-commerce Website
Premium.Description: Product pages - Shopping cart - Animations - Responsive design
